EmailTemplate.name: Freemium Survey 2.Freemium Survey CTA
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card | VMT Product Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Dear Sir or Madam}}:
Please take this 5-minute survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/TPKLZHH> to assist VMTurbo best tailor its new, currently-in-the-works, (free) Cluster Control product. The first 25 respondents to complete the entire survey will receive a $10 Amazon.com gift card, which can be used to purchase any of these items <http://amzn.to/1qdc28B>.
Personally, we're getting the bacon bandages <http://amzn.to/1qBpgel>.
Thank you in advance,
Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
